text:
Glauco Sansovini (20 May 1938 – 21 May 2019) was a Sammarinese politician. He served as one of the Captains Regent of San Marino together with Marco Conti from 1 April 2010 to 1 October 2010. He was born in Rocca San Casciano, Italy.
Sansovini died on 21 May 2019 in Borgo Maggiore, a day after his 81st birthday.
